titles.title: A resolution authorizing Senate employees to testify in an unemployment compensation hearing, In the Matter of Anthony J. Brooks.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/18/1987--Introduced. Authorizes Linda Chu Takayama, Donald W. Spear, and any other Senate employee who may be requested to testify and produce documents relevant to the unemployment compensation claim of Anthony J. Brooks, except concerning matters which are privileged.
